classifieds.title: Zvokutengesera
classifieds.description: Tenga, tengesa, uye chinjana nenharaunda yeNostr
classifieds.noListings: Hapasati pane zvokutengesera. Iva wekutanga kugadzira!

trades.title: Kutengeserana
trades.description: Kutengeserana kwe P2P kwakachengeteka nekudzivirirwa kwe escrow
trades.noTrades: Hapasati pane kutengeserana. Tarisa zvokutengesera kuti utange kutengeserana!

invite.createDescription: Koka mumwe munhu kuti ajoinhe Agora

relays.title: Relays
relays.confirmRemove: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kubvisa iyi relay?

backup.title: Backup Key
backup.description: Chengetedza kiyi yako neshamwari dzaunovimba nadzo

wot.title: Web of Trust
wot.description: Seyera spam uchishandisa network yako yemagariro

info.title: Chii chinonzi Web of Trust?
info.description: Seyera zvirimo zvichienderana nekubatana kwako kwemagariro. Ratidza zvinyorwa zvevanhu vaunotevera chete, kana vanhu vanoteverwa nevaya vaunotevera.

warning.title: Chiziviso Chakakosha Chekuchengetedzeka
warning.description: Ichi chinhu chinopatsanura kiyi yako yakavanzika kuita zvidimbu zvakavharidzirwa. Ukarasikirwa nepasiwedhi yako, HAUKWANE kudzorera kiyi yako. Inyore pasi woichengeta zvakachengeteka.

totalShards.label: Vanhu vangani vaunoda kuvimba navo?
totalShards.description: Kiyi yako ichapatsanurwa kuita zvidimbu zvakati wandei. Munhu mumwe nemumwe anovimbwa naye anowana chidimbu chimwe.

threshold.label: Zvidimbu zvakati wandei zvinodiwa kuti udzorere?
threshold.description: Unofanira kuunganidza zvidimbu izvi kuti udzore kiyi yako.

explanation.title: Izvi zvinorevei?
explanation.description: Uri kugadzira zvidimbu {{totalShards}}. Kuti udzore kiyi yako, uchada chero {{threshold}} chezvidimbu izvozvo. Saka kana dzimwe shamwari dzikarasikirwa nechidimbu chadzo, unogona kuramba uchidzorera chero bedzi shamwari {{threshold}} dzichinacho.

trustees.label: Ndivanaani vaunovimba navo?
trustees.description: Wedzera vanhu vaunovimba navo kuti vabate zvidimbu zvekopi yako. Munhu mumwe nemumwe achawana chidimbu chimwe chakavharidzirwa.

warning.title: Usambokanganwa Iyi Pasiwedhi
warning.description: Zvidimbu zvako zvekopi zvakavharidzirwa neiyi pasiwedhi. Ukazvikanganwa, kopi yako haina basa. Hapana kudzorera pasiwedhi. Inyore pasi woichengeta yakachengeteka.

progress.publishing: Kutumira zvidimbu zvekopi kushamwari dzako dzaunovimba nadzo...

errors.noPrivateKey: Kiyi yakavanzika haina kuwanikwa. Ndapota pinda nekiyi yakavanzika.
errors.failed: Kugadzirwa kwekopi kwakundikana. Ndapota edza zvakare.

emptyStates.noPacksAppearsOwn: Hausati waonekwa pane chero mapaketi ekutevera
emptyStates.noPacksAppearsUser: @{username} haasati aonekwa pane chero mapaketi ekutevera

messages.title: Mharidzo
messages.recipientHint: Pinda Nostr npub (npub1...) kana kiyi yeruzhinji (hex)
messages.checkingReachability: Kutarisa kana mushandisi achigona kugamuchira mharidzo...
messages.notReachableHint: Uyu mushandisi haana kumisa runyorwa rwavo rweDM relay (NIP-17)

step3Features.title: What You Can Do Here
step3Features.subtitle: Your community, your marketplace, your news — all in one place

marketplace.title: Local Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell with neighbors. No middlemen, no fees.

p2p.title: P2P Trading
p2p.description: Trade directly with verified members. Escrow protected.

news.title: Real News
news.description: Authentic stories from your community. No censorship.

example.title: Alternative Supply Chain
example.description: Direct farmer-to-community network reduces costs by 40%...

step4Profile.title: You're joining these leaders
step4Profile.subtitle: Create your profile to stand alongside influential voices in your community.

step5Introduction.title: Introduce Yourself to the Community
step5Introduction.subtitle: Write a brief introduction. Good introductions often earn zaps!
step5Introduction.placeholder: Tell the community who you are, what you do, and what brings you here.

invite.joinGlobal: Join a global community where every story counts

ownYourVoice.title: Own Your Voice
ownYourVoice.description: No censorship. No gatekeepers. Your content, your control, forever.

earnFromStories.title: Earn From Your Stories
earnFromStories.description: Get paid instantly in Bitcoin for valuable content. No banks, no fees.

connectCommunity.title: Connect With Your Community
connectCommunity.description: Trade, share, and build with people who understand your journey.

invite.trustSignals: Built on Nostr protocol • No personal data required • Leave anytime with your content
